segments.text: I see the woman, her expression utterly serene as she polishes dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she exists in a different universe, oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of frustration at her unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing, and yet, she seems lost in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically climbing into the cookie jar now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone has told her how reckless her children can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s one thing to steal a cookie; it’s another to do it while endangering oneself.
segments.speaker: PAR
